mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SHOPPING_CART WHERE ISBN = #{isbn} and TEL = #{memberTel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_CART(tel, isbn, quantity) VALUES (#{memberTel}, #{isbn}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT b.TITLE AS title, b.isbn AS isbn, (b.price*c.quantity) AS price, c.quantity AS quantity FROM shopping_cart c INNER JOIN book b ON c.isbn = b.isbn INNER JOIN member m ON m.tel = C.tel where m.tel = #{memberTel}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SHOPPING_CART WHERE isbn = #{isbn} and tel = #{memberTel}
